member.name: T:Gordon360.Services.ActivityService
member.summary: Service Class that facilitates data transactions between the ActivitiesController and the ACT_CLUB_DEF database model. ACT_INFO (ActivityInfo) and ACT_CLUB_DEF(Activity) are very similar. ACT_INFO is basically a copy of the ACT_CLUB_DEF domain model but with extra fields that we want to store (activity image, blurb etc...) Activity Info and ACtivity may be talked about interchangeably.

member.name: M:Gordon360.Services.ActivityService.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches a single activity record whose id matches the id provided as an argument
member.returns: ActivityViewModel if found, null if not found

member.name: M:Gordon360.Services.ActivityService.GetActivitiesForSession(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches the Activities that are active during the session whose code is specified as parameter.
member.returns: ActivityViewModel IEnumerable. If nothing is found, an empty IEnumerable is returned.

member.name: M:Gordon360.Services.ActivityService.GetActivityTypesForSession(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches the Activity types of activities that are active during the session whose code is specified as parameter.
member.returns: ActivityViewModel IEnumerable. If nothing is found, an empty IEnumerable is returned.

member.name: M:Gordon360.Services.ActivityService.GetAll
member.summary: Fetches all activity records from storage.
member.returns: ActivityViewModel IEnumerable. If no records were found, an empty IEnumerable is returned.

member.name: M:Gordon360.Services.ActivityService.IsOpen(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see if a specified activity is still open for this session Note: the way we know that an activity is open or closed is by the column END_DTE in MEMBERSHIP table When an activity is closed out, the END_DTE is set to the date on which the closing happened Otherwise, the END_DTE for all memberships of the activity will be null for that session
member.param: The activity code for the activity in question

member.name: M:Gordon360.Services.ActivityService.GetOpenActivities(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a collection of all the current open activities, by finding which activities have memberships with an END_DTE that is null
member.returns: The collection of activity codes for open activities

member.name: M:Gordon360.Services.ActivityService.GetOpenActivities(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a collection of all the current open activities for which a given user is group admin, by finding which activities have memberships with an END_DTE that is null
member.returns: The collection of activity codes for open activities

member.name: M:Gordon360.Services.ActivityService.GetClosedActivities(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a collection of all the current activitie already closed out, by finding which activities have memberships with an END_DTE that is not null
member.returns: The collection of activity codes for open activities

member.name: M:Gordon360.Services.ActivityService.GetClosedActivities(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a collection of all the current closed activities for which a given user is group admin, by finding which activities have memberships with an END_DTE that is not null
member.param: The session we want to get the closed activities for
member.returns: The collection of activity codes for open activities

member.summary: Updates the Activity Info

The id of the activity info to be updated
member.returns: The updated activity info resource

member.name: T:Gordon360.Services.JenzibarActivityService
member.summary: Service class to faclitate data transfers between in and out of the JNZB_ACTIVITIES table. This is a special class whose contents might not end up being exposed. The original idea was for this class to represent all the memberships that would be moved to Jenzibar. We have not reached that point yet though.

member.summary: Adds a new Membership record to storage. Since we can't establish foreign key constraints and relationships on the database side, we do it here by using the validateMembership() method.
member.returns: The newly added Membership object
